start.text: Where... where am I? This isn't Zanarkand.
start.speaker: Tidus

wakka_meet.text: Hey! You okay there, ya? You took quite a swallow of seawater.
wakka_meet.speaker: Wakka

choices.text: I'm Tidus. I play for the Zanarkand Abes.

wakka_laugh.text: Zanarkand? That's a good one! You must be hit in the head by Sin's toxin, ya?
wakka_laugh.speaker: Wakka

wakka_concern.text: Sin's toxin... Nasty stuff. Don't worry, we'll get you sorted.
wakka_concern.speaker: Wakka

yuna_intro.text: Come on. The Summoner is at the temple. You should meet her.
yuna_intro.speaker: Wakka
